In 2004, just after revelations about the abuse of Iraqi prisoners at Abu Ghraib, Donald Rumsfeld writes that former Bill Clinton approached him and said: No one with an ounce of sense thinks you had any way in the world to know about the abuse taking place that night in Iraq. I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, Eric Schmidt , who oversaw Google's meteoric rise, told the DLD media conference in He told Reuters on Jan. 21 that his move was an effort to speed up decision-making.`` In strategy we

are structured,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. Eric Schmidt said that he would focus on external issues, such as`` deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships,'' while Page would merge Google's technology and business vision.
